entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • KNOWN ISSUE: .NET SDK 8.0.200 Installs the Incorrect MAUI Workload Versions #20600
  • [Testing] Enable the multi-project template build test #20598
  • [Testing] Review failures from WinUI testing that aren't reporting errors or generating exceptions #20597
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device #20596
    Backlog
  • Unloaded and Loaded events get called multiple times #20595
    Backlog
  • it working ,but now when this is errur Gravité Code Description Projet Fichier Ligne État de la suppression Erreur NU1012 La version de la plateforme n'est pas présente pour un ou plusieurs frameworks cibles, même s'ils ont spécifié une plateforme : net8.0-ios, net8.0-maccatalyst MauiApp1 C:\Users\cc\Desktop\MauiApp1\MauiApp1\MauiApp1.csproj 1 #20593
  • Conflicting values for resource 'Files/Microsoft.Maui/Platform/Windows/Styles/WindowRootViewStyle.xbf' #20592
  • The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui 8.0.7 #20591
  • [iOS] Layout breaks easily in Landscape mode when ScrollView is wrapped in another layout #20590
  • [Shell] Investigate Making TabbedPage compatible with Shell for Android/Windows #20588
    Backlog
  • [iOS] ScrollView's size is not being recalculated, when the size of content changes #20586
  • iOS Linker removes support for PCLCrypto.SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.GetAlgorithm #20583
  • [testing] Reenable test for #18751 #20582
    Backlog
  • Option for disabeling "more" option in Flyout menu #20579
    Backlog
  • [Proposal] Compiling typed bindings using source generators #20574
    .NET 9 Planning
  • vs code run auto suggestion #20573
  • XamlC XC0022 error : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified. #20568
  • iPad DisplayActionSheet displays in top left corner rather than centre #20566
  • error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'Compatibility' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform' #20565

Closed

  • CodeBehindgenerator fails during compilation in Maui with NullReferenceException being thrown #20449
    Backlog
  • error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'iOS' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform' #20589
  • Cannot archive for publishing net8.0-ios Maui single project app with a class library project #20570
  • iOS App crash (or does not work as expected) in Release mode when using default settings and sqlite #20342
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler does not work on Android 14 #19949
  • .NET8 - UseMauiEssentials not working on project targeting net6.0 #18748
  • [X] Simplify XamlServiceProvider setup code generated by XamlC when invoking markup extensions #19650
  • .Net MAUI , change the color of Back Button icon in Shell #20569
  • vs code run autocompltion #20572
  • autosuggestion #20571
  • [Android] Review and fix failing Issue18751Test #20111
    Backlog
  • [Android] Review and fix failing Issue18896Test #20110
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Fix template to get it back to work with the megapipeline. #20587
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [XC] split warnings on ',' and ';' #20578
  • Update TapCoordinates(x, y) UITest implementation #20577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [main] Update to 8.0.200 sdk and stable iOS and Android workloads #20576
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    community ✨
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567

Merged

  • Added text and link to suggest attaching binlog #20599
  • [testing] Ignore flacky tests on iOS17 #20581
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci
  • [Trimming] Fix remaining trimming warnings related to XAML parsing #20474
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add SR2 to issue template #20564

Updated

  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Frames' content update #20501
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-frame
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
    area/testing, area/ListView
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
  • Appshell item template #18615
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, stale
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
